evidence.claim: Pisces Healthcare utilizes AWS infrastructure for scalability and reliability.
The company adheres to HIPAA regulations ensuring secure data handling.
Pisces integrates with EHR systems through HL7 and FHIR protocols.
They use Kafka for real-time data streaming and processing.
Pisces Healthcare supports X12 transaction sets for insurance claims processing.

icp.icp_reason: Pisces Healthcare's focus on X12 and EDI indicates a need for API-first solutions.
